file_content.text: I cannot believe what I just witnessed.
Did... did you just tell yourself to venture beyond the Forbidden Pass?
Tell me everything you know about this place.
What is the Forbidden Pass?
Exactly right.
It's not polite to eavesdrop.
Were you spying?
I only just arrived. It was not my intention to listen in.
I am chilled to the bone. The desert beyond the Forbidden Pass is an area that no one can survive. No one.
Even the Sand People dare not go. You mustn't go.
The opposite is true--I must.
You're mistaken.
Your concern for me is unnecessary.
Don't worry.
Wet your pants somewhere else.
Grow up.
This is not some silly superstition. Those who go beyond the Forbidden Pass are never seen again.
I will not... I cannot follow you there.
I needn't waste any more time with a coward.
Then you're useless. Goodbye.
How that word burns me. I will return to your spaceport and update Darth Baras.
Where is it?
You've done enough, Sharack. Thank you.
I've appreciated your help.
That is... kind of you to say. I told Lord Baras I would see your mission through, but I never imagined it would come to this.
With a heavy heart, I give you the location of the Forbidden Pass.
I am... shamed that my cowardice paralyzes me. I fear I will never see you again.
Suddenly, you're afraid of everything.
More fears?
It seems so.
I'll be fine. I don't plan on dying in this desert.
Don't despair.
If you plan to cross the Forbidden Pass, that is exactly what you are doing.
I should be so lucky. Get out of my sight.
I hope your fear comes true.
Of course. I deserve your disdain.
My spirit is broken. I will return to your spaceport and inform Darth Baras of this development.
I bid you goodbye.
You have proven your way is strong and viable. With this victory, our essence has been purified.
You have proven your way is strong and viable. With this victory, our essence has been purified.
Yes... you have opened yourself to your true destiny. Now we are one.
Yes... you have opened yourself to your true destiny. Now we are one.
In the clarity of this communion... a vision of our destiny on Tatooine appears.
In the clarity of this communion... a vision of our destiny on Tatooine appears.
Can you see it too? An encampment hidden in the farthest reaches of the desert, past a rock formation called the Forbidden Pass.
Can you see it too? An encampment hidden in the farthest reaches of the desert, past a rock formation called the Forbidden Pass.
Is this where I will find the Jedi Master Yonlach?
What awaits me?
Continue.
Forbidden Pass. What an ominous name.
Sounds scary.
There is no doubt this is where the Padawan went... this is where the great Master helped her powers become expressed.
There is no doubt this is where the Padawan went... this is where the great Master helped her powers become expressed.
The image fades. Find the Forbidden Pass and confront Master Yonlach beyond it. Our journey on this planet ends there. Farewell.
The image fades. Find the Forbidden Pass and confront Master Yonlach beyond it. Our journey on this planet ends there. Farewell.
You have lost your way, dark one. But I have come to correct your course.
You have lost your way, dark one. But I have come to correct your course.
I am the embodiment of your greatest potential. I am what you could be if you overcame your fear and walked in the light.
I am the embodiment of your greatest potential. I am what you could be if you overcame your fear and walked in the light.
Impossible. You're trying to trick me.
I don't believe you.
Only someone riddled with fear lies to herself. The light eliminates the need for such fear.
Only someone riddled with fear lies to himself. The light eliminates the need for such fear.
Let me prove that I am you. We hunt Nomen Karr's Padawan, who can see the true nature of anyone.
Let me prove that I am you. We hunt Nomen Karr's Padawan, who can see the true nature of anyone.
Our master, Darth Baras, fears that this girl will expose his network of spies and bring about his demise.
Our master, Darth Baras, fears that this girl will expose his network of spies and bring about his demise.
I accept that you are the light side of me. So what?
Fine, I believe you.
So, I am here to save you.
So, I am here to save you.
I don't know what you're talking about.
I deny all that.
Look at how you persist in trying to hide. And you believe this way to be a sign of strength?
Look at how you persist in trying to hide. And you believe this way to be a sign of strength?
You know too much. I have to silence you.
You shouldn't have said that.
The fear of exposure marks you and Baras as weak. It is the rot of the dark side.
The fear of exposure marks you and Baras as weak. It is the rot of the dark side.
You're mistaken. I am walking the light path.
But I am light.
It is fruitless to lie to me. I am you. I know your heart.
It is fruitless to lie to me. I am you. I know your heart.
It's going to be a shame ruining your good looks.
You've stolen my appearance.
By embracing the dark, you are already ruining yourself.
By embracing the dark, you are already ruining yourself.
If you persist down this path, your life will be consumed by paranoia and fear.
If you persist down this path, your life will be consumed by paranoia and fear.
Betrayal will wait around every corner. You will never know whom to trust.
Betrayal will wait around every corner. You will never know whom to trust.
I like it that way.
Fine by me.
But you might like the alternative better.
But you might like the alternative better.
I don't live in a fantasy world--trust is an illusion.
There's no such thing.
To someone who only knows darkness, it would seem so.
To someone who only knows darkness, it would seem so.
I never thought of it that way.
Interesting point.
Let me enlighten you.
Let me enlighten you.
You see, the dark side seeks to subjugate the Force. It treats the Force as an adversary to be used and manipulated.
You see, the dark side seeks to subjugate the Force. It treats the Force as an adversary to be used and manipulated.
When you embrace the light, you meld with the Force. Become part of it. Then true clarity and peace can be achieved.
When you embrace the light, you meld with the Force. Become part of it. Then true clarity and peace can be achieved.
I have no interest in clarity and peace.
I don't care.
Then you are blind to where true power resides.
Then you are blind to where true power resides.
I can see why that would have its advantages.
I like the sound of that.
It is the true purpose of the Force.
It is the true purpose of the Force.
Don't make me laugh.
You're a joke.
Don't scoff, dark one.
Don't scoff, dark one.
Look at our master. If the dark is so potent, why is Darth Baras deathly afraid of a young girl?
Look at our master. If the dark is so potent, why is Darth Baras deathly afraid of a young girl?
Nomen Karr's Padawan is merely a nascent champion of the light, and already she strikes fear into the heart of a dark side master.
Nomen Karr's Padawan is merely a nascent champion of the light, and already she strikes fear into the heart of a dark side master.
I won't fall for your manipulations.
Peddle that elsewhere.
That is a powerful argument. Maybe the light is stronger.
Very profound.
Then choose now to reverse your path. Commune with me, turn away from the darkness and walk among the enlightened.
Then choose now to reverse your path. Commune with me, turn away from the darkness and walk among the enlightened.
I am beyond redemption, light one.
It's too late for me.
I deny the dark side and endeavor to embrace goodness.
Yes, I choose the light.
You are wise. We embrace now, and you take your first step toward truth and purity.
You are wise. We embrace now, and you take your first step toward truth and purity.
I'll never join you!
Not on your life!
That's why I'm going to destroy her.
Not for long.
If you refuse the light, you must strike me down. Do you have it in you to kill part of yourself?
If you refuse the light, you must strike me down. Do you have it in you to kill part of yourself?
I will eradicate all lightness in the galaxy!
No problem! [Attack]
If I must, I must. [Attack]
I will not fight you.
Not interested in violence.
You must either embrace the light and be made more whole, or battle against it and darken your essence.
You must either embrace the light and be made more whole, or battle against it and darken your essence.
If you do not engage, you encourage the light inside you. Is this what you want?
If you do not engage, you encourage the light inside you. Is this what you want?
You give me no choice--I must engage.
Then my hands are tied. [Attack]
All right, I embrace the light after all.
I change my mind then.
Then there is still a chance. This proves that part of you knows the truth and clings to the light.
Then there is still a chance. This proves that part of you knows the truth and clings to the light.
I now commune with that part of your true essence.
I now commune with that part of your true essence.
I am darkness, and I will cast you out!
No, I will destroy you! [Attack]
Come then, take me on. You will discover the light inside you cannot be vanquished.
Come then, take me on. You will discover the light inside you cannot be vanquished.
Try not to blink. Soak in what true power looks like.
I'm the embodiment of your true potential. I am what you could be if you had the guts to follow the dark path more faithfully.
Take a good long look, lightweight. See the man you're supposed to be.
I'm the embodiment of your true potential. I am what you could be if you had the guts to follow the dark path more faithfully.
This is some kind of trick.
I don't believe you.
A deadly serious trick. The kind that can kill you.
A deadly serious trick. The kind that can kill you.
Let me prove that I am you. We seek Nomen Karr's Padawan, who can see the true nature of anyone.
Let me prove that I am you. We seek Nomen Karr's Padawan, who can see the true nature of anyone.
If she isn't stopped, she could bring down our master's network of secret spies imbedded in the Republic and Jedi.
If she isn't stopped, she could bring down our master's network of secret spies imbedded in the Republic and Jedi.
I don't doubt you are what you say you are.
Okay, I believe you.
Then don't doubt that I know where your current path will lead.
Then don't doubt that I know where your current path will lead.
Who told you that?
Who squealed?
Good, be suspicious. Paranoia will fuel the ruthlessness you need to become a Dark Lord of the Sith.
Good, be suspicious. Paranoia will fuel the ruthlessness you need to become a Dark Lord of the Sith.
Lower your voice. Someone might hear you.
Quiet, that's a secret.
I know that desert nomad guide may be within earshot. If she learns too much, we can kill her.
Like that striking desert nomad guide who follows nearby? We could silence her easily--after I romance her, of course.
Does the idea of destroying her offend you? Don't you see how inhibited you are by denying the dark?
Does the idea of destroying her offend you? Don't you see how inhibited you are by denying the dark?
I follow the path of my master and the Sith to the letter.
But I am dark.
You cannot lie to yourself.
You cannot lie to yourself.
I knew I was good looking, but this is ridiculous.
You are very attractive.
Vanity becomes you. But your looks will do you no good unless you heed my words.
Vanity becomes you. But your looks will do you no good unless you heed my words.
Cease your merciful tendencies and embrace the full meaning of the dark side of the Force--or you will be destroyed.
Cease your merciful tendencies and embrace the full meaning of the dark side of the Force--or you will be destroyed.
Exactly how will I be destroyed?
By what?
There are any number of disasters you are flirting with.
There are any number of disasters you are flirting with.
I'm listening.
Are you threatening me?
You ready to back that up?
Yes.
Yes.
You are Sith. You walk among Sith. The stench of the light in you will be like rot in their nostrils.
You are Sith. You walk among Sith. The stench of the light in you will be like rot in their nostrils.
Darth Baras will smell it on you and will strike you down without mercy.
Darth Baras will smell it on you and will strike you down without mercy.
I don't fear my master. He's clueless about me.
Forget Baras.
Underestimating Baras would be tragic. He tolerates your mercies now because he needs you to destroy Nomen Karr's Padawan.
Underestimating Baras would be tragic. He tolerates your mercies now because he needs you to destroy Nomen Karr's Padawan.
I'm not worried about Baras.
So what?
You are foolish. Baras already plots against you.
You are foolish. Baras already plots against you.
You have a point.
Deep down you've known it all along. This Padawan can destroy Baras. He has foreseen it.
Deep down you've known it all along. This Padawan can destroy Baras. He has foreseen it.
I'll just have to be extra careful.
I can watch my back.
Instead of being careful, seize the upper hand. Baras needs you to destroy Nomen Karr's Padawan.
Instead of being careful, seize the upper hand. Baras needs you to destroy Nomen Karr's Padawan.
He's foreseen his destruction at her hands. If you align yourself with the dark side, you can seduce the Padawan and control her.
He's foreseen his destruction at her hands. If you align yourself with the dark side, you can seduce the Padawan and control her.
You can destroy Baras and take everything he has.
You can destroy Baras and take everything he has.
He has yet to notice anything.
Baras is blind.
Do you really think he would tip his hand to you? See, that is where the light will truly fail you.
Do you really think he would tip his hand to you? See, that is where the light will truly fail you.
The light blinds you to the ill will growing from your fellows. Baras and the other Sith will have the advantage of deception.
The light blinds you to the ill will growing from your fellows. Baras and the other Sith will have the advantage of deception.
And the power of the strongest forces in the galaxy--passion, rage, love! The light shuns and denies these things.
And the power of the strongest forces in the galaxy--passion, rage, love! The light shuns and denies these things.
Go on.
Passion, rage, love... those things only cloud judgment. I'll take my chances.
Emotions are useless.
You're turning your back on true power. Think about it. Baras has seen his own destruction at the hands of this Padawan.
You're turning your back on true power. Think about it. Baras has seen his own destruction at the hands of this Padawan.
The light is a difficult path. I might want to rethink things.
I see your meaning.
Now you're coming around. Think this through. This Padawan Baras wants you to kill can destroy him. He has seen it.
Now you're coming around. Think this through. This Padawan Baras wants you to kill can destroy him. He has seen it.
What if you can seduce her, claim this Padawan for yourself? Corrupt her to the dark, control her and add her power to yours?
What if you can seduce her, claim this Padawan for yourself? Corrupt her to the dark, control her and add her power to yours?
A master of the dark side could turn this Padawan--and then you can destroy Baras and claim everything he has.
A master of the dark side could turn this Padawan--and then you can destroy Baras and claim everything he has.
I'm not convinced.
Sounds shaky.
I think there is merit to what you say.
I like the sound of that.
Good... embrace your dark destiny! Reverse the path you've been walking.
Good... embrace your dark destiny! Reverse the path you've been walking.
Yes, I dedicate myself to darkness!
I embrace the dark side.
Excellent. I commune with you now and deliver you to the purity of the dark!
Excellent. I commune with you now and deliver you to the purity of the dark!
Thanks but no thanks.
I don't think so.
I will not be influenced by you!
Go away, foulness!
I can take Baras without embracing the dark.
I won't need the dark side.
She and I will join forces, and together we will fight the forces of dark.
No, I'll align with her.
Fool! One day, the darkness that you reject will overwhelm you!
Fool! One day, the darkness that you reject will overwhelm you!
